## unbindEvent\_() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use \*\*Blockly.browserEvents.unbind\*\* instead.
> 

Unbind one or more events event from a function call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function unbindEvent_(bindData: browserEvents.Data): Function;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bindData | [browserEvents.Data](./blockly.browserevents_namespace.data_typealias.md) | Opaque data from bindEvent\_. This list is emptied during the course of calling this function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Function

The function call.
